column4: Hi, can someone tell me how to delete a file out of /usr/bin/
use sudo rm <file>, though, if you have to ask, you hsouldnt be messing with it
I just wanted to remove rar
thats done with 'sudo apt-get remove --purge rar'
i'm trying to reinstall rar so i can extract a file do you know how i would use it?
'sudo apt-get install --reinstall rar' to reinstall, and 'rar x <file>
Package rar is not available, but is referred to by another package.
wait... should be in multiverse i think...
how do i add the multiverse it does not say on the site
then you should upgrade, as soon as possible
i'm just waiting on the new cds to be shipped to m
you can do an internet upgrade if you have the bandwith...
I attempted that and it did not work right.. so i figured I should just wait for the cds
remember that you can only jump one step at a time.
i forgot about breezy? i think when i was upgrading i think thats why
you must upgrade to from hoary to breezy, from breezy to dapper and from dapper to edgy
at least get to dapper, since its a lts realease
